attributes.action: limit the engine size of people who have just passed their car test.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
I'm sick of seeing chavs driving round like idiots in their done up chav cars.This is quite annoying but not my main point.

These idiots think they can drive round at whatever speed they want,and most of them are young which means they haven't got much driving experience.They all seem to brag about how fast their cars go(on a public road).

Well i've got the solution.limit the engine size of new drivers to 1.0L for 2 years after passing their driving test.

This should put an end to boy racers and make the roads safer!

reasons: Language which is offensive, intemperate, or provocative
